name: Mystery Ranch Bear Spray Holster
description: Bear spray is like animal insurance for the great outdoors, but if you can’t reach it, you can’t use it. This holster keeps spray close at hand and ready for action.Rugged 500-denier Cordura® nylon.Fits 220g – 380g bear spray canisters.Elasticised hook-and-loop closure secures canistersMOLLE style attachment will fit in PALS webbing, belts, or nearly anywhere you can loop a strap through.High-visibility orange strap.
